nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util

Class OAIPMHStreamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util.OAIPMHStreamer

  • public class OAIPMHStreamer
extends Object
    Class that can aid repository implementations in streaming the OAI-PMH they have generated to the OutputStream provided by the REST layer.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

      • setRootElement

        public void setRootElement(OAIPMHtype root)
        Sets the JAXB root object for OAI-PMH marshallling.
        Parameters:
        root -

      • addJaxbPackage

        public void addJaxbPackage(String pkg)
        Adds a package containing JAXB classes. The following packages are automatically added:
        1. org.openarchives.oai._2 (OAI-PMH schema)
        2. org.openarchives.oai._2_0.oai_dc (oai_dc container)
        3. org.purl.dc.elements._1 (DarwinCore)
        If you implement you IOAIRepository using JAXB, you must add any extra packages (most likely generated by xjc) used to generate the final OAI-PMH output.
        Parameters:
        pkg -

      • addSchemaLocation

        public void addSchemaLocation(String xmlNamespace,
                     String schemaLocation)
        Expands the xsi:schemaLocation attribute of the <OAI-PMH> root element with the specified namespace-location pair. The schema location of the XSD for OAI-PMH is automatically added. The XSD location for oai_dc, however, is not automatically added since you might be serving a request for a different metadata format. However, you can simply add the XSD location for oai_dc by calling addOaiDcSchemaLocation().
        Parameters:
        xmlNamespace - The XML namespace
        schemaLocation - The XSD location

      • addOaiDcSchemaLocation

        public void addOaiDcSchemaLocation()
        Adds the XSD location of the oai_dc namespace. See addSchemaLocation(String, String).

      • stream

        public void stream(OutputStream out)
            throws JAXBException
        Writes the OAI-PMH (set via setRootElement) to the specified output stream.
        Throws:
        JAXBException
